episode: I was skiing down a snowy mountain and heard a rumble, looking behind me, I saw a large patch of snow and rocks approaching me.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I was skiing on a snow mountain when suddenly I heard a rumble and looked back to see an avalanche in the distance.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That must have been terrifying! Are you okay?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It was very scary and I feared for my life, obviously I ended up ok.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm so relieved you're safe. Must've been a heart-pounding moment!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It certainly got my adrenaline pumping at the time.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: What an intense experience! Glad you made it through safely.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes, though in the moment, I didn't know if I was going to survive.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds terrifying. I'm just glad you're here to tell the tale.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I was terrified and panicked a bit, I ended up finding refuge in a nearby forest and clung to a tall, sturdy tree to ride the avalanche out.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: What a harrowing ordeal. You were clever to find safety.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I remember the instructor telling us to find anything we could take cover behind, so I was lucky to be near a small forest.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Good thinking to recall that advice. That forest really saved you!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I ended up with some bruises and cuts, but I was extremely lucky to only get those. I later heard some people unfortunately did not make it.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm so sorry to hear about the others. Glad you're okay, though.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes, it was sad, I think around 3 people lost their lives that day.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's heartbreaking. Glad you're safe, though.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Thank you, it was a horrifying ordeal I hope to never experience again, and I am actual going skiing again soon, so I hope it is just a peaceful and calm vacation.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Wishing you a safe and relaxing trip!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Thanks, this was a cathartic experience, I hope I didn't ramble.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Not at all, glad it helped.
